title: A grounding and balancing Ayurvedic meditation
description: In the hectic pace of daily life, it can be difficult to stay focused and rooted in yourself. Give this grounding and balancing Ayurvedic meditation a try and get back in tune with your own nature.
cleaned_text: A grounding and balancing Ayurvedic meditation by Rituals Cosmetics published on 2021-09-17T08:49:16Z In the hectic pace of daily life, it can be difficult to stay focused and rooted in yourself. Give this grounding and balancing Ayurvedic meditation a try and get back in tune with your own nature.
